default.title: Obtain the Sinner
default.text: You... It's you?! You saw the firelight, didn't you? I knew you would. Hehe, I've been waiting for you... for so long.

default.title: Raise to Phase 1
default.text: I see it... the fire that will be lit.

default.title: Raise to Phase 3
default.text: I... am alight... Excellent! They can finally come back...

default.title: Level Start
default.text: It's too dark... I'll start a fire here.

default.title: Win Battles
default.text: (Relieved exhale)... It wasn't that scary after all...

default.title: Lose Battles
default.text: D-don't come any closer... Go away!

default.title: Ultimate Skill
default.text: This is the guidance of the flames!

default.title: Die in Battles
default.text: Help... Somebody help me...

default.title: Greeting
default.text: You're back... Did you find them? No...? Just asking; don't be nervous. At least, I'm still here...

default.title: Conversation 1
default.text: My eyes are blind to what you see, but they see what you can not... They see the rising red moon, they see the descending illusion... If you wish to get out of here alive, you must follow my guidance. Do you hear me?

default.title: Conversation 2
default.text: The voice I heard... told me to light the torch. It said, it's the only way to bring you guys back... It didn't lie to me; not completely, at least. You came back...

default.title: Conversation 3
default.text: The people here... they're always saying bizarre things that make no sense to me... Can you understand them...? W-what do they want? You'll protect me, right?

default.title: Special Conversation 1
default.text: No one has ever treated me this way... Why? Why did you guys take me in when you know nothing about me? And you're sharing your food with me, protecting me, even though you clearly don't believe what I've told you...

default.title: Special Conversation 2
default.text: I also hate... that supreme being... But the supreme being does exist, just up ahead, in the direction you're heading. Why... Why don't you guys believe me?

default.title: Special Conversation 3
default.text: Please don't go any further... That's a trap. If you do, the darkness will consume every one of you. I know you don't want to trust the words of a liar... but this time I'm really telling the truth...

default.title: Full Compliance
default.text: It's all your fault... Because of you, I forgot how to survive on my own... Being left alone in a place like this, it was terrifying... Stay with me. Don't leave me again. I don't want to be left alone anymore...

default.title: Idle
default.text: Shh! Don't make a sound! The supreme being is watching us... I can sense it.

default.title: Annoyed
default.text: You... you bully! (Sounds as if about to cry)

default.title: Special Attention
default.text: Once again, you ventured into the darkness and found me. (Pleased) I knew you would; it was predestined. I knew that no matter how long it took, you would find your way back to me...

default.title: Dispatch
default.text: This is the supreme being's will too...

default.title: Dispatch Complete
default.text: I won't lose my way.

default.title: Level Up
default.text: The flames... have grown brighter.

default.title: Pat Head
default.text: Stop...! You must not... defile the priestess!

default.title: Deploy
default.text: There is nothing to fear. I'm here to show you the way...
